items.content_html: os-profiler is a lightweight utility that provides a snapshot of system resource utilization, including CPU, memory, and disk usage. This package is ideal for profiling system utilization in real-time. It enables you to track resource consumption and helps ensure that systems are running efficiently.
items.title: evrentan/os-profiler: os-profiler is a lightweight utility that provides a snapshot of system resource utilization, including CPU, memory, and disk usage. This package is ideal for profiling system utilization in real-time. It enables you to track resource consumption and helps ensure that systems are running efficiently.

items.content_html: relative-time-converter is a lightweight utility that converts absolute dates or timestamps into human-friendly, relative time phrases like "2 hours ago" or "in 3 days." Perfect for improving date displays in apps, websites, or dashboards.
